summary: Full backend + frontend testing of NightCafe Studio Data Bridge. All 10 backend tests pass (100%). Frontend gallery, stats, search, detail panel all working. Extension files validated.

integration_issues.issue: Console shows 404 on page load - likely the test import's imageUrl (placeholder URL) failing to load. Not a real bug, image onError handler gracefully hides broken images.

issues: 'Verwijder' and 'Annuleer' buttons partially hidden behind Emergent badge overlay in preview environment (testing-env only, not a production bug)

critical_code_review_comments: GET /api/imports/stats/summary route defined AFTER GET /api/imports/{import_id} - FastAPI will match /stats/summary as an import_id parameter. This is a route ordering bug: move stats/summary BEFORE the /{import_id} parameterized route. Currently works only because FastAPI evaluates fixed paths before parameterized ones, but this is fragile.
server.py: @app.on_event('shutdown') is deprecated in newer FastAPI versions - use lifespan context manager instead
seed_data_creation: Test import with creationId=TEST_abc123 created and deleted during test run. 'Test Creatie' (existing seed data) preserved.
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core flows working. Backend: health, POST import, duplicate detection, GET imports, stats, DELETE all pass. Frontend: gallery grid, stats bar, search, detail panel (image/prompt/model/url/importedAt), delete confirmation all work correctly. Extension manifest valid MV3, all required files and icons present.
rca_of_issues: Console 404 is the image from 'Test Creatie' seed data having a placeholder imageUrl that returns 404 - handled gracefully via onError in App.js. Route ordering concern: /imports/stats/summary defined after /imports/{import_id} in server.py but FastAPI handles this correctly due to its internal path matching priority.
